Emergency Preparedness

Develop detailed plans and policies in case of emergencies (fire, natural disaster, active shooter, health emergencies, etc.). Plans should:

Requirement already met (or can be met with minimal effort) Requirement can be met fairly easily Requirement can be met with some effort/cost Requirement will be very difficult to meet Requirement cannot be met

- Take into account needs of vulnerable groups and provide employee assistance as appropriate (staff with disabilities, children, the elderly, etc.);
